article.headline: St. Bonaventure 69, Central Arkansas 64 (OT)
article.story: OLEAN, N.Y. (AP) -- Michael Lee scored 17 points and added 10 rebounds, leading St. Bonaventure in a 69-64 win over Central Arkansas in overtime Tuesday. Zarryon Fereti had a 3-point basket for St. Bonaventure (2-1) to tie the game 61-all with 1.2 seconds left in the second half and force overtime. Tyler Relph followed up in with a 3-pointer to put St. Bonaventure in the lead for good. Fereti finished with 12 points. Durrell Nevels scored 16 points and grabbed seven rebounds to lead Central Arkansas (1-1). Paul Williams finished with 12 points and eight rebounds, while A.J. Hawkins and Terron Diggs each added nine points for St. Bonaventure. Nate Bowie added 13 points for the Central Arkansas, and Fernando Johnson had 12 rebounds. The Bears, in their first season as a member of Division I, committed 24 fouls, compared to St. Bonaventure's 12. After shooting 1-for-9 (11.1 percent) from the 3-point line in the first half, St. Bonaventure connected on 7-for-11 (63.3 percent) in the second half.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
